name: .MSG File Extension
summary: Learn about .MSG files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an MSG file with Microsoft Outlook in Windows simply by double-clicking the file. If Outlook is not set as the default application for opening MSG files, you can right-click the file and choose Outlook to open the MSG file. When opened in Outlook, the program formats the message appropriately to appear the same way it appeared before being exported.
You can also open MSG files with third-party programs, such as Encryptomatic MsgViewer Pro (Windows) and 45RPM MailRaider Pro (macOS).

Microsoft Outlook can convert MSG files to several file types. For example, you can convert MSG files to .HTML files by selecting File â†’ Save As. You can also convert MSG files to .PDF files via the Microsoft Print to PDF option.

windows.name: Open and view .MSG files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
